content: मंगल्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंगलाय हितं यत्] {@--1@} Auspicious, fortunate, happy, lucky, prosperous; <ls>Ms. 2. 31.</ls> {@--2@} Pleasing, agreeable, beautiful. {@--3@} Holy, pure, pious; त्रिलोकीमं गल्यां <ls>U. 4. 10.</ls> --ल्य {@--1@} The sacred fig-tree. {@--2@} The cocoanut tree. {@--3@} A sort of pulse. {@--4@} The Bilva tree. --ल्या {@--1@} A species of fragrant sandal. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--3@} A kind of aloe-wood. {@--4@} A particular perfume. {@--5@} A particular yellow pigment. --ल्यं {@--1@} Auspicious water for the coronation of a king (brought from various holy places). {@--2@} Gold. {@--3@} Sandal-wood. {@--4@} Red lead. {@--5@} Sour curds.
